title: burberry   medium leather chai
text: Burberry Medium Leather Chain Tote By Kelly Cook on  October 27, 2010 12:00 pm  Kelly CookBurberry has come a long way with making their bags more desirable for the non tartan obsessed.  This belted tote with chain detail is super cool!  I would totally use this and that is not something I can easily say about most Burberry bags.  This is an easy bag to use on a daily basis and it has all the trappings of current looks.  I’m totally loving the chain that dangles off to one side as an accessory for the accessory.  The belted strap can stay unlocked and actually looks good that way.  At Saks Fifth Avenue for $1195.You Will Also Like10 Tips to Get Your Best Skin Ever in 2015Drunk Elephant Founder Breaks Down The Difference Between…How to Keep Long Hair HealthySummer Beauty Tips for Asian Hair and Skin Share This Story    Read more articles about: Tote 7 thoughts on “Burberry Medium Leather Chain Tote”    shoppingqueen4755 says:   October 27, 2010 at 2:16 pm  very rocker chic, LOVE IT!http://www.shop.com/trends/rocker+chicReply     Eva says:   October 27, 2010 at 3:25 pm  Is it just me or has Burberry been pretty fabulous lately, in handbags terms?Reply     Stacy says:   October 27, 2010 at 10:07 pm  This really is a fab bag.
